item.title: Quad-rotor
item.description: Project Overview: Quad-Rotor VTOL Drone Control System Step 1. Understand the Objective The quad-rotor is a widely recognized VTOL (Vertical Take-Off and Landing) drone used in various applications, such as military surveillance and agricultural services, where high safety and low cost are essential. The challenge lies in developing a complex control strategy to manage uncertainties from wind and its mathematical model. Step 2. Learn the Key Details This project, as demonstrated in this video, focuses on creating advanced control mechanisms for a quad-rotor to operate effectively under uncertain conditions, such as varying wind forces and complex dynamics, while maintaining low operational costs and high safety standards.
